long_description: The prAna Linked T-Shirt for men features a soft blend of organic cotton and polyester to keep you comfortable during yoga and light exercise. Features three circular mandalas balanced on one another; the words "everything is linked" are printed above hem on wearer's left side. The prAna Linked T-Shirt for men offers a performance fit.
short_description: The prAna Linked T-Shirt for men features a soft blend of organic cotton and polyester to keep you comfortable during yoga and light exercise.
